# zig.mod

* https://github.com/nektro/zigmod
  * https://nektro.github.io/zigmod/

* https://github.com/nektro/zigmod/blob/master/docs/tutorial.md
  * https://aquila.red/

```
zig init-exe
zigmod init
```
